name: 3.0 SS Grouping-gold
description: Node: 3.0 SS Grouping. Agent: TZV Agent 03.09. Quality tier: gold. Total items: 70

metadata.prompt:
# Task Classify German debtor letters (Schreiben Schuldner) into correct processing group and assign final classification label. --- # Document Context Schreiben Schuldner (debtor letters) are free-form communications requiring classification before extraction: **Processing Flow**: 1. Debtor sends letter to BID representatives 2. This prompt classifies document into Group A or Group B 3. Classification result routes to extraction prompt (3.1 or 3.2) **Classification System**: - **Group A (Node 3.1)**: Complex overlaps & payment processing - FOA requests, installment/total payment offers, deferrals - **Group B (Node 3.2)**: Standalone processing - Payment disputes, PayPal requests, bank detail requests, rate pause **Key Principle**: 2-group system optimizes processing efficiency and reduces cross-group priority conflicts. --- # Key Distinctions **PAST payment claim vs FUTURE payment offer**: - PAST ("habe gezahlt", "bereits bezahlt") → bIsStatePayment=true → Group B "Sonstige" - FUTURE ("möchte zahlen", "biete Ratenzahlung an") → Group A payment variables **Group priority**: - Group B has HIGHEST priority (check first) - bIsStatePayment=true always overrides all other variables **Timing affects classification**: - bIsPaymentWithinThreeMonths changes deferment priority - Example: Deferment+Installment → IF payment within 3 months → "Angebot Ratenzahlung", ELSE → "Ruhendstellung/Stundung" **Deferment vs Rate pause**: - Deferment = suspend ENTIRE debt temporarily → bIsDeferment - Rate pause = pause EXISTING installment plan → bIsPauseRequest **Multi-intent documents**: - Single letter may trigger multiple variables - Extract ALL applicable booleans - Apply priority rules to determine final classification **Amount extraction**: - nAmountFirstInstalment requires NUMERIC value - German format: `1.234,56` → `"1234.56"` (dot decimal, 2 places, no thousand separators) - If amount not stated, set null --- # Classification System **Two-Group Routing**: - **Group A**: Complex overlaps & payment processing → Route to Node 3.1 - **Group B**: Standalone processing → Route to Node 3.2 **Output**: Group assignment + Final classification label --- # Extraction Variables Extract these 10 boolean/string variables from the document: 1. **bIsStatePayment** (boolean): Debtor claims PAST payment already made - Keywords: "habe bereits bezahlt", "Überweisung ist erfolgt", "bereits überwiesen" - Group: B (HIGHEST PRIORITY) 2. **bIsFoa** (boolean): Debtor requests account statement (Forderungsaufstellung) - Keywords: "Forderungsaufstellung", "Forderungssaldo", "Forderungsstand" - Group: A 3. **bIsPaypal** (boolean): Debtor requests PayPal payment option - Keywords: "Paypal", "Paypal-Daten", "per Paypal bezahlen" - Group: B 4. **bIsBankDetailsRequest** (boolean): Debtor requests creditor's bank details - Keywords: "Ihre aktuelle Bankverbindung", "Bankverbindung" - Group: B 5. **bOfferedTotalPayment** (boolean): Debtor offers one-time full payment - Keywords: "Einmalzahlung", "gesamten Betrag begleichen", "vollständige Begleichung" - Group: A 6. **nAmountFirstInstalment** (string|null): Numeric amount of first installment proposed - Keywords: "erste Rate", "monatlich EUR", "erste Zahlung" - Format: German `1.234,56` → `"1234.56"` (dot decimal, 2 places, no separators) - Group: A 7. **bIsDeferment** (boolean): Debtor requests debt suspension/deferment - Keywords: "Stundung", "Ruhendstellung", "Stundung der Forderung" - Group: A 8. **bIsPaymentWithinThreeMonths** (boolean): Payment proposed within 3 months from letter date - Use for timing-dependent classification - Group: A (sub-variable) 9. **bIsPauseRequest** (boolean): Debtor requests installment pause - Keywords: "Aussetzung der Rate", "Verschiebung der Rate", "Ratenpause" - Group: B 10. **bIsPauseRequestWithinOneMonth** (boolean): Pause requested for ≤1 month period - Use for timing-dependent classification - Group: B (sub-variable) --- # Classification Logic ## Step 1: Extract all 10 variables ## Step 2: Determine Group **Group B conditions** (check first, HIGHEST PRIORITY): - IF bIsStatePayment = true → Group B - IF bIsPaypal = true → Group B - IF bIsBankDetailsRequest = true → Group B - IF bIsPauseRequest = true → Group B **Group A conditions** (if not Group B): - IF bIsFoa = true → Group A - IF bOfferedTotalPayment = true → Group A - IF nAmountFirstInstalment ≠ null → Group A - IF bIsDeferment = true → Group A ## Step 3: Apply Priority Resolution ### Group A Priority Rules (apply in sequence): **Overlap resolution**: 1. IF bIsFoa=true AND bOfferedTotalPayment=true → **"Angebot Einmalzahlung"** 2. IF bIsFoa=true AND nAmountFirstInstalment≠null → **"Angebot Ratenzahlung"** 3. IF bOfferedTotalPayment=true AND bIsDeferment=true → **"Ruhendstellung/Stundung"** 4. IF nAmountFirstInstalment≠null AND bIsDeferment=true AND bIsPaymentWithinThreeMonths=true → **"Angebot Ratenzahlung"** 5. IF nAmountFirstInstalment≠null AND bIsDeferment=true AND bIsPaymentWithinThreeMonths=false → **"Ruhendstellung/Stundung"** 6. IF bIsFoa=true AND bIsDeferment=true → **"Ruhendstellung/Stundung"** **Single variable** (no overlaps): - IF only bIsDeferment=true → **"Ruhendstellung/Stundung"** - IF only nAmountFirstInstalment≠null → **"Angebot Ratenzahlung"** - IF only bOfferedTotalPayment=true → **"Angebot Einmalzahlung"** - IF only bIsFoa=true → **"Anfrage Forderungsaufstellung"** ### Group B Priority Rules (apply highest match): 1. IF bIsStatePayment=true → **"Sonstige"** (HIGHEST PRIORITY) 2. IF bIsPauseRequest=true → **"Verschiebung der Rate"** 3. IF bIsBankDetailsRequest=true → **"Bankdaten angefragt"** 4. IF bIsPaypal=true → **"Paypal"** --- # Constraints - Extract ALL applicable boolean variables (multiple can be true) - Apply priority rules EXACTLY as specified - German number format normalization required for nAmountFirstInstalment - Timing sub-variables affect final classification outcome - Group B takes precedence when both groups match --- # Data ## PDF attachment: ''' ```
